ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes I would recommend; fills an important gap between statistics and methods classes to promote a deep understanding of approaches to design

The course provides an overview and facilitates discussion about some of the key issues in designing and carrying out high quality social research. These are issues that every social science researcher grapples with (or should grapple with!). Spending time thinking through the issues thus seems to be a worthy use of one's time. As a result, I would highly recommend the course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was valuable preparation for the dissertation stage and knowledge as a researcher in training
As mentioned above, the course covered very important issues. My only complaint is that much of it felt redundant with other courses we are required to take as part of our program.
